description: Developed scalable RESTful APIs and integrated AI models like Google Gemini for automation, semantic search, and intelligent content generation.
Worked on Salesforce platform, developed custom business solutions, integrated REST APIs, and completed Salesforce training with 51 Trailhead badges and 1 Superbadge.
Completed certified MERN Stack training, built full-stack apps using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node, and gained hands-on API development experience.
